snippet: Mitt Romney has the weakest favorability ratings on record for a presumptive presidential nominee at this stage of the campaign, according to new polling by ABC News and The Washington Post.
abstract: Mitt Romney has the weakest favorability ratings on record for a presumptive presidential nominee at this stage of the campaign, according to new polling by ABC News and The Washington Post.

headline.main: Romney's Favorability Is Weakest on Record, Polling Shows
